2.2.name: wordpress/comm100-live-chat
2.2.description:
Comm100 Live Chat is the enterprise-grade live chat software for website. It enables you to have a 360 degree view of your website visitors and provide them with live support.

Comm100 Live Chat WordPress Plugin is specifically designed for you to quickly install Comm100 Live Chat onto your WordPress site. It enables you to have live chat monitoring code and the live chat button added on your WordPress site pages with just a few simple steps. It will boost both your sales and customer satisfaction.

What Our Customers Say

"Comm100 Live Chat is a way to generate leads and convert them to sales. We thank Comm100 for providing such a useful live chat service." ------ Jeniffer, Complete Online Pharmacy

"We are very impressed with Comm100 Live Chat. Having tried live support type products for our business in the past, live chat never seemed to really benefit our bus
